metadata.title: CVE-2014-5255 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: xcfa before 5.0.1 creates temporary files insecurely which could allowlocal users to launch a symlink attack and overwrite arbitrary files. Note:A different vulnerability than CVE-2014-5254.

criterions.comment: xcfa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
